title: “‘Animal” raped sobbing toddler then left her bleeding on a bathroom floor’
text:
The Collier County Sheriff’s Office is looking for Roberto Lopez, who they say raped a two-year-old girl. (Picture: Collier County Sheriff’s office)

Police are searching for a man they say raped a two year old girl before leaving her bleeding on a bathroom floor.

Roberto Lopez, 40, is wanted by authorities on one charge of sexual battery of a victim under 12 in Immokalee, Florida.

The Collier County Sheriff’s Office asked he public for help locating Lopez, writing on Facebook: ‘We need your help in locating this animal.’

‘This guy is pure evil and does not need to be on our streets,’ the post continued.

According to incident report from the sheriff’s department, a witness said she woke up and heard crying coming from a bathroom near her bedroom. She knocked on the door and a man, identified as Lopez, opened it and left. The witness saw blood on the man, the bathroom floor, and the victim who was crying, according to WINK News.

It is unclear if the attack happened at a home. Police have not specified where it took place.

The girl’s father took her to the hospital, believing she was injured in a fall, but a doctor determined that the child suffered an ‘injury located in her vaginal area’ and called police, according to the Miami Herald.

Girl, 8, had tear ducts torn out during 2nd mauling from dog her mother refused to give up

Police said the woman who witnessed knocked on the bathroom door later identified Lopez in a photo lineup. It is unclear what either Lopez or the witness’s relationship is to the girl.

The sheriff’s office said: ‘the victim is safe and in the custody of the Florida Department of Children and Families.

They also said that the suspect goes by several aliases including Rigoberto Lopez Velasquez; Marco Velasquez; Mario Velasquez; Marcos VasquezPerez; Marcos Velasquez; Rigoberto Lopez; Pascual Lopez Garcia; Marcos Vasquez Perez; and Marcos Perez Vasquez.
